text: wait almost 40min to get my order with only 1 waffle and 1 Popcorn chicken. in front only 2 customer. very slow service and lousy food quality. the waffle is cool and popcorn chicken are salty.. very disappointed. will nvr come again.This restorant only suitable for those not hungry persons
The food is toooo oily & tasteless. The girl at the counter also rude. They should train their staff how to deal with customer. Please do something terrace by gleneagles !

If the pricing does not, then food definitely does a good job at chasing customers away. (one piece roti telur for RM 7)

We ordered a few items today:

Nasi lemak ayam. The nasi lemak was severely lacking in lemak, rice was served cold on a cold plate. Also, the freshly fried chicken appeared juicy, but the "juice" was mostly oil.

Meehoon was slightly undercooked and obscenely dry. It was rather bland, and dehydrated, but the colour did look good, fooling me into ordering it.

Roti Canai and Teh tarik set, something you'd expect to be half decent, wasn't good at all. The roti was tough and doughy, and the Teh tarik tastes like it's been made out of an instant packet; I wouldn't be surprised if it was haha.

Overall the ambiance was nice, we enjoyed the cooling sheltered alfresco with a gentle  morning breeze. The service was good as well, they brought the food to our table so we didn't have to pick it up at the window. However I wouldn't come back for the great fear of disappointing food ðŸ˜±
